<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>71092</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic612</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:natecaji/pic612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Narobe svet</string>
            <string language="en">World upside down</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltoberseite unten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monde à l'envers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mundo de cabeça para baixo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mondo inverso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος ανάποδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mundo al revés</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kaplica vode lahko deluje kot konveksna leča, ki sliko obrne.</string>
            <string language="en">Water drop can act like a convex lens that causes the image to turn upside down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kapljica</string>
            <string language="en">drop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">konveksna leča</string>
            <string language="en">convex lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pot svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">light path</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wassertropfen kann wie ein konvexes Objektiv 
fungieren, das das Bild veranläßt, Oberseite unten zu drehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La baisse de l'eau peut agir comme un objectif 
convexe qui fait tourner l'image à l'envers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A gota da água pode agir como uma lente convexa 
que faça com que a imagem gire de cabeça para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La goccia dell'acqua può comportarsi come un 
obiettivo convesso che induce l'immagine a girare inverso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απελευθέρωση ύδατος μπορεί να ενεργήσει όπως έναν 
κυρτό φακό που αναγκάζει την εικόνα για να γυρίσει ανάποδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gota del agua puede actuar como una lente 
convexa que haga la imagen dar vuelta al revés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tropfen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexes Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heller Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">baisse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif convexe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gota</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lente convexa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">goccia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivo convesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso chiaro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απελευθέρωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτός φακός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφρύ μονοπάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gota</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lente convexa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">camino ligero</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
